#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[10001]={0},b,max=0,k;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{cin>>b;
		a[b]++;
		}
	    for(int i=0;i<=10000;i++)
	    {
	    	if(a[i]>max)
	    	{
	    		max=a[i];
	    		k=i;
	    	}
	    }
	    cout<<k<<" "<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
